channel.title: Please Help
channel.description:
Hey Everyone,
Well I Have Recently Made A Server, And I Can Connect To It From 0.0.0.0 And 127.0.0.1. My Parents Recently Reset Router By Pressing The Reset Button In Back. When I Try And Connect With My Real Ip It Says "Error Connecting To Server" Does This Mean I Will Have To Port Forward Again?
Thanks,
I0wneveryone. ;)

item.title: Please Help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I Have A 2Wire 2700HG-S And Portforward.com Doesnt Have My Router And I Searched On Google, NOTHING. :mad:

Read full topic
